attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You and other politicians are elected to do what your constituents tell you. They are your employers. However they are always ignored. I petition you to do what is right and actually listen to the people who vote for you and do what you are told. I have to do what my tell you so do what your boss says! (in case you don't understand the people are your boss!)
